name: Buccaneer's Regret
description:
After your mutiny fails, ruthless Captain Hardbeard sentences you to walk the plank. Can you outsmart him and survive? At what cost to your soul?

Created during Ptbo Game Jam 04. This was my first crack at game development, and I'm pretty happy with the way it turned out. I was tempted to expand/polish the narrative, but in the end I decided I preferred to keep it as a record of what I could accomplish in a 32-hour window.

Thanks for playing!
